xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: A module for accessing global caches for sharing data between concurrent sessions

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: create
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: create($cache-name as xs:string, $config as map(*)) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Explicitly create a cache with a specific configuration
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $config A map with configuration for the cache. At present cache LRU and permission groups may be specified, for operations on the cache. `maximumSize` is optional and specifies the maximum number of entries. `expireAfterAccess` is optional and specified the expiry period for infrequently accessed entries (in milliseconds). If a permission group is not specified for an operation, then permissions are not checked for that operation. Should have the format: map { "maximumSize": 1000, "expireAfterAccess": 120000, "permissions": map { "put-group": "group1", "get-group": "group2", "remove-group": "group3", "clear-group": "group4"} }
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:boolean : true if the cache was created, false if the cache already exists

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Get the names of all current caches
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:string* : The names of all caches currently in use.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: put
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: put($cache-name as xs:string, $key as xs:anyType+, $value as item()*) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Put data with a key into the identified cache. Returns the previous value associated with the key
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: item()* : The previous value associated with the key

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: list
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: list($cache-name as xs:string, $keys as xs:anyType*) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: List all values (for the associated keys) stored in a cache.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $keys* The keys, if none are specified, all values are returned
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: item()* : The values associated with the keys

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: List all keys stored in a cache. Note this operation is expensive.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:string* : The keys in the cache. Note these will be returned in serialized string form, as that is used internally.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: get
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: get($cache-name as xs:string, $key as xs:anyType+) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Get data from identified global cache by key
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: item()* : The value associated with the key

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: remove
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: remove($cache-name as xs:string, $key as xs:anyType+) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Remove data from the identified cache by the key. Returns the value that was previously associated with key
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: item()* : The value that was previously associated with the key

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Clears all key/values from either all caches or the named cache
Clears all key/values from either all caches or the named cache

Eviction policy work of the cache is performed asynchronously. Performs any pending maintenance operations needed by the cache, on the current thread. Typically not needed by users, and only used for testing scenarios. Requires 'clear' permissions.
